body.name: 2.5K Portable Gaming Monitor, 16" 2520x1680 1500:1 IPS Laptop Monitor, Slim Lightweight USB C HDMI Computer Display, Gaming Screen with Speakers, Travel Monitor for Mac PC Phone PS4/5 Xbox Switch
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 【2.5K Portable Monitor】: Enjoy spectacular visuals with our MagicRaven portable monitor, featuring an IPS A-grade screen with 16 inch, 2520x1680 resolution, 1500:1 contrast ratio, 300 nits brightness, 100% sRGB, 178 degree wide viewing angle and 60 hz refresh rate. With HDR, Low Blue Light and FreeSync features, you'll experience images like never before.

【Larger 16" Monitor Screen】: Our 2K 3:2 second monitor provides a larger field screen with 2520x1680 resolution compared to other 16" monitors. You'll see more detail and get a wider field of vision, allowing you to work and play with ease.

【Increase your Productivity】: Connect our dual monitor to your device with a cable and increase your productivity instantly without any driver installation. Our portable screen is a great choice for a second or multiple screen, allowing you to work more efficiently and improve your gaming experience.

【Dual USB-C Port】: The dual monitor is plug-and-play without any driver installation. This laptop extend monitor provides 2 USB-C 3.2 ports and a Mini-HDMI 2.0 port, allowing you to connect to most devices with US-C 3.1 Gen2 or HDMI 2.0. Use USB-C 3.1 Gen2 cable or HDMI 2.0 cable (All including in package) for video transmission. Use USB-C able for power transmission (DON'T USE MICRO-USB Port to GET POWER)

【Slim Design & Customer Service】: This portable laptop monitor is only 1.1 lb weight (Monitor Only), 0.2" - 0.39" thickness. MagicRaven offers 30-day return, 90-day repalcement, 2-year warranty, lifetime support. 24/7 customer service reply within 8 hours. Trustworthy and cost-effective choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good image quality
reviews.reviewText: I'd buy this MagicRaven display again. I bought the 16" 2560×1680 60Hz panel. It's nicely packaged. It comes with a 5' mini-HDMI cable, a 5' USB-A to C power cable, a 4' USB-C video cable, a 5V brick, and a cloth.I'm most impressed with the panel's performance on an older laptop via the HDMI cable. Windows selected 1920×1200 resolution and scaled text nicely (150%). It is, however, unwieldy using the USB-A cable for power. I did not use the power brick; I plugged into the laptop for power.I am migrating to MacOS and purchased this panel to use with my Mac Mini until I can afford a better display. I like that a single cable supplies power and signal. I am less impressed using this with my Mac, but that's not the panel's fault.On the down side, I'm still figuring out the best resolution and the scaling options to use with my Mac Mini. Stictly speaking, you don't need "Better Display" to have all resolutions shown, but you'll want it (or something similar) so you can see the OSD and use your keyboard to adjust brightness. You'll also want "eqMac" to see the OSD and adjust volume with the keyboard. Both apps have free versions.For the money, this is an excellent monitor. It's bright enough, colors are good, blacks are deep, and the mono audio is acceptable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great monitor for the price
reviews.reviewText: Great monitor. Light weight, portable, and 2K is best for the size of this monitor. I use it everyday as a second monitor for my Mac Air. It charges the Mac Air via the USB-C. The only thing I wish it had is a USB hub that I can connect other accessories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Good, the Bad and the Ugly of the 2.5k Portable Monitor 16"
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for a portable monitor that can fit in your backpack, has a decent resolution and doesn't cost a fortune, you might be tempted by the 2.5k Portable Monitor 16". But before you hit that buy button, let me tell you about the good, the bad and the ugly of this device.The good: The monitor has a sharp and bright display, with a resolution of 2560 x 1440 pixels. It supports HDMI and USB-C inputs, and comes with a stand and a protective case. It also has built-in speakers, which are surprisingly loud and clear.The bad: The monitor is not very sturdy, and feels cheap and flimsy. The stand is wobbly and unstable, and the case is not very protective. The monitor also has a noticeable lag when connected to a laptop or a console, which can be annoying for gaming or video editing.The ugly: The monitor has a terrible battery life, lasting only about 2 hours on a full charge. It also gets very hot after prolonged use, and sometimes shuts down unexpectedly. The monitor also has some dead pixels and backlight bleeding, which are noticeable on dark backgrounds.So, is the 2.5k Portable Monitor 16" worth it? Well, that depends on what you're looking for. If you want a cheap and portable monitor that can display high-resolution content, and you don't mind the low quality and reliability, then go ahead and buy it. But if you want a durable and reliable monitor that can handle gaming or video editing, and you don't mind spending more money, then look elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Awesome display for traveling.
reviews.reviewText: I use it with Mac 16" m1 max for streaming/ live presentation during travel as multiple windows at same time. OBS, Keynote, Zoom and audio interface and extra resource window.Works great so great that actually added a second one after the first purchase. So I now have 3 screens and iPad Pro as forth. Now I also use ipad to mirror screen for zoom when my wife do presentations When I do the presentation I pad is used as whiteboard so I can do live illustrations/notes as cam directly from iPad to obs.Ok product review:* Find it very light, great for travel.* Case / stand: very light and works great but it feels little flimsy and only have one position to choose from. I as another user points out it feels the case will not last that long. Time will Tell. I pulled one star for this.*Resolution is slight better than my Mac so you will not have any compromise there.* Colors can not beat the Mac but displays very well. But what I do like better is that It has more like matte finish so you will by far, not get the same glare from reflection compared to the Mac.* The monitor enclosure give feel been cheap and "plasticky" but at same time feels it is not gonna be any issue. Great due its light weight.*Physical size almost identical to my Mac 16 in all directions (H W L)*Powers through Mac usb c port no extra power needed. Comes with power (just regular usbc power supply) supply if you need use hdmi cable instead or connect it no powered bus like iPhone or iPad.Final Note: I original bought 2.5 K screen for 100 USD and then found this one so returned it before even open it. and got one of this for double price. I loved it some much actually when ahead bought my second few days later. Great buy for 200 use price range.One picture show 4k video one one display (not sure if i”pic give any justice) and other my setup with two the two extra screens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable monitor
reviews.reviewText: This monitor is FANTASTIC! When on the road, it's a must to have with your laptop. Makes production so much easier having that second monitor. HIghly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING SCREEN THAT RIVALS MY EXPENSIVE ONES
reviews.reviewText: Needed this screen since my kids took over my main screens and I mostly use my handheld pc now. I still wanted a 144hz 1440p/1600p monitor and got this one. This screen has amazing colors out the box, brightness is great and overall quality is good. Viewing angles are a bit rough and the stand isn't really safe. Other than that gaming on it is exceptional with very little input lag or ghosting. Would recommend !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Customer Service is amazing!
reviews.reviewText: Although the screen did not work as advertised with a single USB-C Thunderbolt cable I reached out to customer service and they immediately worked with me issue a refund on the product.I’ll continue to use the screen since it really is a well made product.Screen is bright and vivid even compared to my laptop screen.It’s thin with a little weight to it but durable.I like the magnetic case is completely detachable.Great product for portable gaming or productivity for just over $200.

reviews.reviewTitle: Economica pero sorprende el desempeño muy buena
reviews.reviewText: Se ve increible...ligera ...funciona de maravilla..probada con ps4; PC ,nintendo switch...... ..ya sea por medio del cable tipo c a tipo c...o con el cable mini hdmi a hdmi .....colores perfectos...buen brillo bastante alto si se quiere...todo funciona...conectada al enchufe...o una salida usb de pc..o una power bank...funciona.

Es un excelente producto (al menos yo no e tenido ningún problema), viene listo solo para desempaquetar y usarlo, ya viene con todos los cables necesarios y con un cargador para la alimentación por si lo conectas por cable mini HDMI (ya incluido) ya que si se conecta por uno de los puertos USB tipo C puede pasar imagen y alimentación,claro esto depende del emisor (consola,laptop, CPU) si puede proporcionar corriente por su puerto USB C

Se los recomiendo mucho, al principio tenia mis dudas, la calidad esta excelente, no lastima, los colores muy buenos, y es muy ligero, mi iPad pesa más que el monitor, viene con múltiples cables de conexión, muy grata compra.

reviews.reviewTitle: RECOMENDADO, muy bueno para su precio
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Me gusto la calidad del empaque, accesorios y de la pantalla. Es bastante delgada. Los cables se sienten duraderos. Cuando la conecte a la laptop la identifico enseguida sin embargo no se aprovecha toda la pantalla. Excelente definición para el precio. La compre con descuento, con tarifa de importación incluida y a meses sin intereses así que encantado. De mi parte es una compra recomendada. Recomiendo cuidado con su transporte porque no creo que sea tan resistente a golpes.
Me gusta el tamaño, al ponerlo con mi laptop si da imagen de calidad, pero cuando pongo mi celular OPPO reno 7, no lo quiere hagarrar la tarde imagen
